meanings.definition: A type of decorative work made by sewing quills onto leather or fabric.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to create beautiful quillwork by sewing quills onto leather.
meanings.sent2: The artist displayed her intricate quillwork at the craft fair.
meanings.sent3: The quillwork on the bag made it look like a piece of art.
meanings.sent4: Her quillwork was as delicate as a spider's web, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the quillwork brought life to the plain fabric.

meanings.definition: The art or technique of creating designs using quills.
meanings.sent1: She practiced quillwork to perfect her design skills.
meanings.sent2: The museum showcased various examples of traditional quillwork.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at quillwork turned out to be a colorful disaster.
meanings.sent4: The quillwork of her imagination soared beyond the limits of reality.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns of the quillwork mesmerized the audience.
